-Added balcony near T spawn

-Added a box near the dining area

_sText:
2 workers high above the city floors (and on a rainy night) are held hostage by Terrorists. Their motivations are unknown, but they catch the attention of the CT's. They must rescue them by going deeper into the building. Is someone playing the piano??

Some other cool things about this map:
-Support for 64 players (32v32)
-Interactable toilet stalls :D
-A balcony to get up to via parkour
-Ambience
